root: ^The player has completed some mini-games, but not quite enough.
^The player has completed both enough mini-games and been to the other dimension, but does not have the board from Punk.
^The player has completed both enough mini-games and been to the other dimension, where he got board from punk.

FirstEncounter: ^A perfect someone to play Phutball with me.
^I don't really have time for games
Acceptance: ^Great, oh but I forgot Punk has borrowed my board and we will need some counters to play.
^Where do I get the board from?
WhatIs: ^A game of my own creation, some Philosophers Football.
^I don't really have time for games
WhoAre: ^My friend Punk calls me Monster. It is a pleasure to meet you.
Strangename: ^Well I suppose that is what happens when you don't believe the math is going to work. It was Monsterous Moonshine but You should always trust the Math. So Punk calls me monster because I finally recognized the moonshine.
^Well let’s get the things together for Phutball.
Punk: ^Punk has a board. She's over in Qualitivile. She is a great conversationalist if a little obsessed with travel.
Board: ^Oh she is working on her own game. I am not sure she has thought through the mathematics of it yet though. It's not really her speciality.
^ Well I'll go get the board then
WhereToStart: ^There are games and puzzles all around you. Give them a try and they will unlock pieces for us.
GameInfo: ^Well yes. You could say that games are life or at least can simulate it. Combinatorial game theory is fascinating.
SomeButNotEnough: ^Oh great you have some of the pieces we still need a couple more however.
JustGive: ^I suppose we could but it would not be nearly as satisfying now would it?
^Why do they call you Monster again?
Accept: ^Great when you get back we can start to play.
NoBoard: ^I can see you have collected enough pieces but we still don't have a board.
CompletedMiniGames: ^Wonderful you have my board back from Punk and enough of all the pieces shall we start to play?
^Yes I am looking forward to it.
Rules: ^I will explain once the board is all setup.
Fin: ^Just let me get the pieces setup on the board.
